MTM 18+

Annual survey of Canadians 18+ on media and tech behaviors.

Juniors

Youth media survey for Canadians ages 2–17.

Newcomers

Media and tech habits of recent arrivals to Canada.

FR EN
Industry

Targeted data-driven decision at your finger tips

Unlock a clearer understanding of how Canadians consume media and adopt new technologies. MTM turns complex datasets into actionable insights so you can plan confidently and stay ahead of change.

Benefits of MTM

Anticipate Shifts

Anticipate shifts in consumer behavior like tracking how streaming adoption is accelerating compared to TV across different age groups.

Monitor Tech Adoption

Stay ahead by monitoring how quickly Canadians adopt emerging tech, from 5G smartphones to VR headsets, using MTM 18+ insights.

Tailor Campaigns

Tailor campaigns more effectively by analyzing newcomer data, such as WhatsApp and TikTok usage among recent immigrants.

Back Major Decisions

Use MTM data to back major decisions, for example comparing rural vs. urban broadband adoption through the Census Tool.

Shape Strategies

Shape strategies using MTM Junior findings, like children’s streaming preferences and device usage patterns.

Shifts that Shape the Industry

75%

Audience adoption of connected platforms is accelerating.

Traditional media still plays a role, but its share is steadily declining.

What industries say about us

Industry leaders across Canada rely on MTM’s verified insights to guide funding, measure performance, and strengthen accountability across the media ecosystem.

Our decisions have to stand up to scrutiny — from where funding goes to how impact is measured. MTM’s data gives us that credibility. It connects audience behaviour to real outcomes, helping us plan investments and policies that actually reflect how Canadians consume media today.

- Role, Org

Frequently Asked Questions

MTM helps you validate audience assumptions with data sourced from over 12,000 Canadians annually. Use insights from our DAT and Trending Tools to strengthen your recommendations and back your media plans with credible, defensible numbers.

Yes. The DAT Tool lets you segment data by age, gender, region, and language. You can quickly visualize patterns across MTM 18+, Junior, and Newcomer datasets to tailor your strategy for each target audience.

MTM releases new reports and dataset updates twice a year — with additional insights and trend analyses published regularly. This ensures your campaigns are informed by the most current media consumption data in Canada.

Absolutely. You can download charts, graphs, and visual summaries directly from the DAT Tool to include in your decks, ensuring every recommendation you make is supported by real Canadian data.

Yes. Our team can guide you through advanced queries or customized data views during your demo session. Many agencies use this to tailor MTM data for specific client sectors or campaign objectives.
